biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler

Class CompilerOptionsBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler.CompilerOptionsBuilder

  • public class CompilerOptionsBuilder
extends Object
    Responsible for creating new instances of the CompilerOptions which are compatible with version 1.7.5.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompilerOptionsBuilder()
      Constructs a new instance.
      CompilerOptionsBuilder(OperatingSystemChecker systemChecker)
      Constructs a new instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompilerOptions create()
      Creates a new instance of the CompilerOptions.
      List<String> getIncludePaths()
      Returns available include paths (default: empty list).
      String getRootPath()
      Returns a path which will be added to every generated import and URL in the CSS code (default: "").
      String getUrlsArgument()
      Returns an argument which will be added to every URL (default: "").
      boolean isIeCompatability()
      Checks whether the CSS code should be compatible with IE browser (default: true).
      boolean isMinified()
      Checks whether the compiler will minify the CSS code (default: false).
      boolean isRelativeUrls()
      Checks whether the compiler will rewrite relative URLs (default: false).
      boolean isStrictImports()
      Checks whether the compiler will disallow an @import inside of either @media blocks or other selector blocks (default: false).
      boolean isStrictMath()
      Checks whether the compiler will try and process all maths in the CSS code (default: false).
      boolean isStrictUnits()
      Checks whether the compiler will guess units in the CSS code when it does maths (default: false).
      CompilerOptionsBuilder setIeCompatability(boolean ieCompatability)
      Sets whether the CSS code should be compatible with IE browser.
      CompilerOptionsBuilder setIncludePaths(List<String> includePaths)
      Sets available include paths.
      CompilerOptionsBuilder setMinified(boolean minified)
      Sets whether the CSS code should be minified.
      CompilerOptionsBuilder setRelativeUrls(boolean relativeUrls)
      Sets whether the compiler should rewrite relative URLs.
      CompilerOptionsBuilder setRootPath(String rootPath)
      Sets a path which will be added to every generated import and URL in the CSS code.
      CompilerOptionsBuilder setStrictImports(boolean strictImports)
      Sets whether the compiler should disallow an @import inside of either @media blocks or other selector blocks.
      CompilerOptionsBuilder setStrictMath(boolean strictMath)
      Sets whether the compiler should try and process all maths in the CSS code.
      CompilerOptionsBuilder setStrictUnits(boolean strictUnits)
      Sets whether the compiler should guess units in the CSS code when it does maths.
      CompilerOptionsBuilder setUrlsArgument(String urlsArgument)
      Sets an argument which will be added to every URL.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
